title: BBC correspondent explains the role of fuel switches
description: The BBC's Theo Leggett explains that the two switches were moved which caused the crash
excerpt: The BBC's Theo Leggett explains that the two switches were moved which caused the crash
text: The preliminary report into the Air India crash in June has found that both fuel control switches, which are used to turn the engines off, were moved to the cut-off position.The BBC's International business correspondent Theo Leggett explains the role of the switches and how shifting them is a two-stage process.2 hours agoAviation accidents and incidentsAviation safetyIndiaAir html:
The preliminary report into the Air India crash in June has found that both fuel control switches, which are used to turn the engines off, were moved to the cut-off position.

The BBC's International business correspondent Theo Leggett explains the role of the switches and how shifting them is a two-stage process.

2 hours ago
